Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Service”
Reviews.Author: texasbondgrrl
Reviews.Content: stayed earlier month business trip boyfriend chose hyatt based price location quick cab ride event attending theatre blown friendly soon entered greeted wonderful gentlemen feel family jerome matt pick floor amazing clean cool functional layout nice living perfect relax event front desk able quickly call cab returned evening adrian staff poured couple nightcaps snacks heated time bring soo friendly feel home bed comfortable nights stay morning selection breakfast items choose wonderful stay definitely choose hyatt future

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: Brenda G
Reviews.Content: recent trip dallas medical procedure decided book near facility opposed fighting dallas morning traffic spacious clean cozy staff friendly fun chat serve starbucks coffee location perfect getting appointment am convenient onoff highway definately stay

Reviews.Title: “Good area”
Reviews.Author: wannabefoodieHouston
Reviews.Content: weve stayed location awkard ins outs easy freeway mini space kitchen sink mini fridge coffee maker tons counter space brushing teeth toiletshower tiny nice desk space couch space relax tv im happy towels worn dark tint hotels bleach towels added bonus disinfectant hope fluke checkin person grumpy lobby food welcoming hate avoid

Reviews.Title: “"Great location for a weekend stay"”
Reviews.Author: Richard_Temple_TX
Reviews.Content: met college daughter 2 roommates dallas game 1st weekend october game cowboy stadium easy access hotel staff mixup harm breakfast undistinguished matter planned brunch bed usual hyatt flat panel tv able hotwire couple days notice

Reviews.Title: “Nasty Brown Tap Water Probably Put a Bad Taste in Our Mouth...”
Reviews.Author: Andiecob1
Reviews.Content: friend booked hotel business event dallas ride actually excited hotel deal hyatt expecting quality service 4 hour drive check ready wash bit realize water coming faucets dark brown color smells sewage mortified checked sinks shower actually video footage called front desk aware expecting apologetic maybe move hotel reaction theyd send downstairs try potable water faucet ladies stairs disgusting front desk person plumbing called manager finally able track phone yes shut water earlier day happens water run fine received apology checked situation resolved disappointed disgusted happen

Reviews.Title: “nice clean affordable hotel”
Reviews.Author: atxgrl79
Reviews.Content: hotel location friendly staff clean breakfast fruit juice corners tell remodel overall nice comfortable pillows awesome flat screen perfect finishing touch stay hyatt park central plan staying future trips dallas

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Weekend!!”
Reviews.Author: Andangi
Reviews.Content: stay hyatt extremely pleasant ive stayed hyatt austin dallas location sits hwy 75 hotel service satisfactory free parking continental breakfast value couldnt beat 60night suites plenty spread comfy enjoy separate living bathroom decent little cramped breakfast light perfect day started

Reviews.Title: “Dangerously slippery shower”
Reviews.Author: busyworkingmomof3
Reviews.Content: slipped fell shower handrails hit head hard sprained broke finger banged knee talked hyatt corporate affairs left message manager hyatt park center call following monday heard am afraid hurt badly unsafe showers serious

Reviews.Content: staff hotel helpful eat meeting highway home wonderful breakfast selection clean beds comfortable brought timely manner attending class university door

Reviews.Content: stayed fri sat night looked simple outside inside layout modern contemporary flow clean booked double bed enjoyed separate living couches pull couch mini fridge bar sink counter space extra space table wifi perfect lag enjoyed bathtub sink outside food healthy choices breakfast buffet cereals selections bagel muffins various etc own items quiet except doors sounds travel location easy access moving town utilize workout computer business kept shape
